Text: Abu ku Ne̩biukadre̩za, onu Babilo̩n, mu Je̩konaya, o̩ma Jiho̩yakim, onu Juda, manyʼamagboji Juda kpʼamacho̩na e̩wñ, kpʼamagwalo̩ ño̩ kwo Je̩rusale̩m kʼi la ko ma wa Babilo̩n, Jihofa dʼe̩wñ-i ña mi: Go, agba o̩gbaikolo meji jʼane̩ o̩gba unyi Jihofa.
Agbaʼka nʼe̩ro o̩gbaikolo e-o̩me̩me̩le̩, dab e̩ro o̩gbaikolo ki kpa ejodudu, agba ekeji muda nʼe̩ro o̩gbaikolo ki bie̩ne̩ nana, e̩bie̩ne̩-wñ jʼaje̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Je̩re̩maya, e̩wñ e̩ li? U kakini, E̩ro o̩gbaikolo, o̩gbaikolo-wñ e-o̩me̩me̩le̩ nyo̩ tabale, e-e̩bie̩ne̩-wñ la bie̩ne̩ tabale, e̩bie̩ne̩-wñ jʼaje̩ n.

Abu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l aka de̩ kakini, Dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ro o̩gbaikolo e o̩me̩me̩le̩-i, abe̩le̩ oñ abo ku ma ño̩ bi Juda te̩ ade̩ eju-mi, owñ chʼabo kʼu ko kpuche̩ kwʼugbo-i nyʼane̩ abo Kaldia kʼi chenyo̩ ñwu ma.
Nakʼeju-mi rʼuma tod e̩nyo̩, tak u nako ma dabi wʼane̩-i. Ene nane ma nyʼo̩gba, nagu uma lo̩ n; nako ma gbe̩, nachi ma rinyo̩ n.
Oñ nadʼe̩do̩ ñwu ma kʼama ki ma kʼomi che Jihofa; tak ama achʼamone̩-mi, oñ omi achʼO̩jo̩ e-ma, todu ama adabi wa ba mi kpʼo̩gbo̩dudu e̩do̩-ma.

Jihofa kakini, Alu kʼe̩ro o̩gbaikolo le̩ bie̩ne̩ kʼe̩bie̩ne̩-wñ ma jʼaje̩ n, abe̩le̩ oñ nache Ze̩de̩kaya, onu Juda kpʼamagboji-wñ kpʼabubo̩ abo Je̩rusale̩m ku ma bo̩ oj ane̩-i kpʼabo ku ma gugu ane̩ Ijipti chuu.
U la ako ma jo̩ ku ma fʼume̩ ne tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩ nyʼojane̩ ojane̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ile̩-i du kʼi bie̩ne̩ ñwu ma, ku ma mud oli ina kpai ita kpai aku kpai ama, ugbo du kʼu nane ma ru.
Tak unakʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpai o̩kpo̩ta kpai e̩wñ ibi wa efuma, gbogbo taku ma fu malie̩ bʼane̩ kʼu ko ñwu ma kpʼamata-ma te̩ hioko.
